trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for requesting the security status of an action from the <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para solicitar o status de segurança de uma ação do <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You must inherit from this class to provide a class that includes a property that specifies the security-sensitive action to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Você deve herdar dessa classe para fornecer uma classe que inclui uma propriedade que especifica a ação de segurança a ser executada.

trans-unit.source: The SecurityState object that is instantiated from the derived class is passed to the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the host allows that action to be performed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de SecurityState é criar uma instância da classe derivada é passado para o <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para determinar se o host permite que a ação ser executada.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão da <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>método sempre retornará `false`.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method must be overridden to detect the actions that are allowed.
trans-unit.target: O método deve ser substituído para detectar as ações que são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to access a Web camera in your library code, you would create a `WebcamSecurityState` object and call the <xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A> method to determine whether the host allows Web camera access, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser acessar uma webcam no seu código de biblioteca, você criaria um `WebcamSecurityState` objeto e chamar o <xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A>método para determinar se o host permite acesso à câmera da Web, conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir.</xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A>

trans-unit.source: (You can find the code for `WebcamSecurityState` in the "Example" section.) ``` WebcamSecurityState securityState = new WebcamSecurityState("Safe access to Webcam", WebcamSecurityOptions.SafeAccess); try { securityState.EnsureState(); // Allocate memory. } catch (ApplicationException e) { // Handle any exception that is thrown. System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(e.Message); } ``` To process the call the <xref:System.AppDomainManager> must be made aware of `WebcamSecurityState` through an override of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: (Você pode encontrar o código para `WebcamSecurityState` na seção "Exemplo".) ``` WebcamSecurityState securityState = new WebcamSecurityState("Safe access to Webcam", WebcamSecurityOptions.SafeAccess); try { securityState.EnsureState(); // Allocate memory. } catch (ApplicationException e) { // Handle any exception that is thrown. System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(e.Message); } ```Para processar a chamada a <xref:System.AppDomainManager>devem estar cientes de `WebcamSecurityState` por meio de uma substituição do <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, ensures that the state that is represented by <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, garante que o estado é representado por <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> está disponível no host.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method should be similar to the following example.
trans-unit.target: A implementação deste método deve ser semelhante ao exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the state for this implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> class is available on the current host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o estado para essa implementação de <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> classe está disponível no host atual.

trans-unit.source: IsStateAvailable calls the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the state that is represented by this class is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: Chamadas de IsStateAvailable a <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para determinar se o estado que é representado por esta classe está disponível no host.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Security.SecurityState> class for an example implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Security.SecurityState>classe para um exemplo de implementação do <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>método.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> </xref:System.Security.SecurityState>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado está disponível. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
